para: PointFromSegments is a , used as the constructor argument of the command when building &skel; boundaries. It creates Point Boundaries from the currently selected &skel; &sgmts; or from a group of &sgmts;. The &sgmts; are specified by the group parameter, which must be either the name of a &sgmt; group or the special object, selection. The boundary is constructed from the &nodes; at the end of every &sgmt; in the group, whether or not they're on the exterior of the set, as shown in .

caption.para: Selected &sgmts;, in green, on the left, and a point boundary constructed from them, in orange, on the right. Boundary conditions will be applied at all the highlighted &nodes;, even those that aren't at the geometrical boundaries of the region.
